title: sections 100, 101 and 102 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall come
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Sections 100, 101
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Sections 100, 101 

and 102) (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (sections 100 101 102) (commencement) order 2022

title: sections 100, 101 and 102 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall come
heading: 2. The 18th day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 18th day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which 
sections 100, 101 and 102 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall come 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [684] 3

title: sections 100, 101 and 102 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall come
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order specifies the date for the purposes of Sections 100, 101 and 102 of 
Finance Act 2022 (No.44 of 2022) which provide for the Temporary Business 
Energy Support Scheme. The date specified is 18 December 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [684]
